# 2nd National Congress of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party

The '''2nd National Congress of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party''' (LPRP) was held in Vientiane on 3â€“6 February 1972. The congress occurs once every five years. A total of 125 delegates represented the party's nearly 21,000 card-carrying members.
The 2nd National Congress renamed the party; from Lao People's Party to the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
